mapper.insert: insert into project (projectName, startDate, endDate, progress, script, leader) values (#{projectName}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{progress}, #{script}, #{leader});
mapper.select: select p.projectId, p.projectName, p.progress, g.position, g.role, g.progress from projectgroup g join project p on g.projectId = p.projectId where g.userId = #{userId};
